channel.title: Theater on Tedium: The Dull Side of the Internet.
channel.description: Recent content in Theater on Tedium: The Dull Side of the Internet.

item.title: Addicted To Spectrum
item.description: You know a tool that’s proved incredibly useful to the theater world? The wireless microphone. It sounds small, but it’s actually a really huge improvement over what they previously had. These devices, which have come into their own over the past two decades, have helped to improve actors’ freedom of movement allowing their performances to be more natural while still remaining fairly easy to hear. But they haven’t always been perfect.
